summary: It makes Ebony Mail, light armor. This mod also adds a lore friendly (not to over-powered ) armor set that includes (custom enchanted version and unechanted) Ebony Mail and Nightingale boots, gloves, and hood.
descriptionHtml:
This is a little armor mod I put together. It makes the Ebony Chainmail (Ebony Mail), light armor . It is better than glass, but a little worse than dragonscale. It thought it was kinda wierd it was heavy becuase it was more aimed at sneaky characters. This mod also adds a armor set that is Ebony Chainmail and Nightingale boots, gloves, and hood (thought it looked awesome). There is a unechanted version that is craftable(under ebony), and enchatable. Both are temperable Hope you enjoy it.
 How to get:
-Craftable under ebony (unechanted)
-Elicor\'s Armor (enchanted) can be found in the DB Hideout near Falkreath. The chest in under water, but needs a key. Give you a hint it is in the first room. 
This armor will only be available via the two ways listed above
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This is also available on Steam.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Plans for the future:
- Custom perk for when wearing full set
- Different way for getting it like a boss battle
- Maybe a quest still a newbie in the creation kit, but ill try
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Anyway this is my first mod so go easy on me.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Update 1: Changed enchantments, name of enchanted version (Elicor\'s Armor), and name of Ebony Mail (Ebony Chainmail).
author: ztect

files.name: Light Ebony Mail and Assassin armor
